height="395" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-27" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="407" y="95" width="140" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-28" value="int main() {<br style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp; ...<br style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp; r = sumar(1,2);</b><br style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp; ...<br style="font-size: 14px;"><div style="font-size: 14px;">}<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="416.99" y="105" width="120" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-29" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400.37" y="270.5" width="153.63" height="164.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-30" value="<p style="line-height: 90%; font-size: 9px;"><font style="font-size: 9px;">int sumar(int a, int b, int *res)<br style="">{<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; cs = mq_open('QServidor', ...);<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; cq = mq_open('QCliente', CREAT);<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.cod_op&nbsp; = ADD;<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.a = a;<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.b = b;<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.qCli = 'QCliente';<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_send(cs,&nbsp;&nbsp; &amp;msg);<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_recive(cc, &amp;msg);<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_close('QServidor');<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_close('QCliente');<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_unlink('QCliente');<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; *res = msg.resultado;<br style="">&nbsp;&nbsp; return msgerror ;<br style="">}<br> ...<br></font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="404" y="280.5" width="150" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-31" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-36" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="622.37" y="70" width="223.63" height="395" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-37" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="668.51" y="281.5" width="145.49" height="169.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-38" value="<p style="line-height: 90%; font-size: 9px;"><font style="font-size: 9px;">int main(...)<br>{&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp; cs=mq_open('QServidor',<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CREAR);&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp; while (true)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp; {<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_receive(&amp;msg);&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (msg.cod_op == ADD) {&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; res = sumar(msg.a, <br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.b);&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; cc= mq_open(msg.qCli);<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.res = res;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; msg.cod_err = err;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_send(&amp;msg);<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mq_close(cc);&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ...&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>}</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="678.13" y="292" width="133.38" height="150.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="T6mWXbbeyyW4qJU8r1GU-39" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry b);<br>}<br><br>int restar (int a, int b) {<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return (a-b);<br>}<br><br>. . . ."
